pepperInfo.name: Sweet Bell Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild, sweet pepper often used in cooking and salads.

pepperInfo.name: Banana Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild, tangy pepper commonly used in salads, sandwiches, and pickling.

pepperInfo.name: Anaheim Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild chili pepper with a slight heat, often used in Mexican and Southwestern cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Poblano Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild to medium chili pepper with a rich flavor, commonly used in Mexican dishes like chiles rellenos.

pepperInfo.name: Cubanelle Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild, sweet pepper often used in salads, sandwiches, and frying.

pepperInfo.name: Cherry Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A small, round pepper with a mild to moderate heat, often used in pickling and salads.

pepperInfo.name: Pepperoncini Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild chili pepper with a slight heat, commonly pickled and used in salads and sandwiches.

pepperInfo.name: Jalape√±o Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A medium to hot chili pepper with a distinctive flavor, commonly used in Mexican cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Hungarian Wax Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A mild to moderate chili pepper with a waxy texture, often used in salads and pickling.

pepperInfo.name: Serrano Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper with a bright, crisp flavor, commonly used in Mexican cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Tabasco Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper with a sharp, tangy flavor, commonly used to make Tabasco sauce.

pepperInfo.name: Cayenne Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper commonly used as a spice in cooking, particularly in Cajun and Creole cuisines.

pepperInfo.name: Thai Chili Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A very hot chili pepper commonly used in Thai cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Aji Amarillo Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper with a fruity, citrusy flavor, commonly used in Peruvian cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Aji Limo Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper with a bright, citrusy flavor, commonly used in Peruvian cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Habanero Pepper
pepperInfo.description: One of the hottest chili peppers with a fruity, floral flavor, commonly used in Caribbean cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Scotch Bonnet Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A hot chili pepper with a fruity, tropical flavor, commonly used in Caribbean cuisine.

pepperInfo.name: Bird's Eye Chili Pepper
pepperInfo.description: A very hot chili pepper commonly used in Southeast Asian cuisines.
